summary: Takes Away All Of The Mists In All Of Skyrim's Interiors And DLC Interiors.
descriptionHtml:
This mod simply takes away ALL of the mist effects in the game and all DLC's..
(So everything won't be so spooky and creepy) lol
It should also increase your FPS by a couple of frames even!

The only ones that I didn't remove were the important ones at these interior locations:

*Radiant Raiment In Solitude

*The Katariah

*Hall Of The Dead In Windhelm

*Dead Men's Respite Cave

*The Nightcaller Temple

Simply Place The .esp File In The Data Folder Of Your Skyrim Directory Here:

.../steam/appz/common/skyrim/data

Please endorse this mod if you like it would really mean the world to me and motivate me to make even better ones in the future!!!
author: metalmania1
